overview: Facesitting fetish kings Roman Video caught the eye of Evil Angel founder John Stagliano with their focused, no-bullshit style of female-dominant ass-smothering. In their line of best-of compilations for Buttman Magazine Choice, Roman lures the viewer with a parade of sexy facesitters who spend some time talking to the camera about themselves between suffocating helpless men with their asscheeks. Asses of Face Destruction 5 showcases several girls (like big-assed bitches Alexis Texas and Whitney Stevens) who possess wide, plush posteriors just built for a man's face!
title: Asses of Face Destruction 5
